I

ISenetencePart - Interface in Unnamed Package
A marker interface for classes that can be part of a Sentence, such as Word or Punctuation.

S

Sentence - Class in Unnamed Package

Constructs a new Sentence.
sortWordsBySecondLetter(List<Word>) - Method in class TextOperationService
